604290.name: X-Blades - Soundtrack
604290.description:
Enjoy Ayumi’s world apart from visuals: with the Official X-Blades Soundtrack.
An acoustic experience of the action-packed adventure, with a total playing time of approx. 75 minutes including the amazing title song "Golden Despite".

X-Blades Official Soundtrack Playlist:

01. Golden Despite (Master Mix) - [03:35]
02. Gunblades Theme - [02:42]
03. Ayumi’s Race - [01:33]
04. Exploration of the Broken Shell - [02:42]
05. Power of the Elementals - [03:28]
06. Abandoned Coast Theme - [02:13]
07. Dark Exploration - [01:52]
08. Fight the Dark One - [02:24]
09. Mysterious Symbols - [02:38]
10. Depressor’s Theme - [02:20]
11. Temple Run - [01:32]
12. Beat the Crabs - [02:20]
13. Fight the Horde - [02:22]
14. God Fight - [02:48]
15. Challenge in the Trap - [02:12]
16. Credits Track - [02:08]
17. Who will attack me - [01:56]
18. Pangolin Race - [01:59]
19. Galapagos Attack - [02:15]
20. Spider Destruction - [01:57]
21. Above the Great Rift - [02:11]
22. Long Descent - [04:48]
23. Nerving Ghosts - [03:56]
24. The Huge Pentagram - [04:56]
25. Search for the Artifact - [04:45]
26. Sequence of War - [02:05]
27. Stand up and fight - [03:35]
